Containers.Info: Name these labels to what your tagged containers in-game are. label 1  uses currency 1 below.. etc
Containers.Info1: Use only euros, roubles, dollars (exact letters) in the order you want the labeled containers to return money.. eg. dollarStuff container returns items in dollars.
Containers.Info2: Only enter a trader id if you want to use that trader to sell... otherwise it will use ragfair.

Info2: True if you don't want regular container restrictions
